short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set custom background images for your chrome browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Image Infusion – Transform your Chrome browser into a personalized visual experience!

With Image Infusion, you can create stunning slideshows from your favorite images that appear every time you open a new tab. Whether it's landscapes that inspire you, memories that uplift you, or artwork that sparks creativity, your browser becomes a canvas for your unique style.

⭐ FREE Features ⭐

✨ Custom Image Slideshows – Upload images of your choice and create a personalized slideshow for your browser background. 
✨ Easy Image Management – Add or delete images from your slideshow with just a few clicks. 
✨ Customizable Intervals – Control how often the images change, setting the perfect rhythm to keep you refreshed. 
✨ Sleek and Seamless – Enjoy a smooth browsing experience without any disruptions. 
✨ Private and Secure – Your data and images are kept private; we never share or sell your information.

Join the community of users transforming their browsing into a beautiful, personalized experience with Image Infusion.

Unlock creativity and inspiration with every new tab!

Privacy & Security

We prioritize your privacy. Image Infusion does not track, sell, or share your data. All your images are stored locally for your use only.

Install now and make your browsing a reflection of you!
